page.title: 19SCHOOL IN 1985
page.content:
Work in{Connaught School}is the same as most schools.The subjects are Science,English,Maths,Art,Craft and French. In the fourth year there are French survival courses called Golf and Tricolor. Over the years the school has bought 3 BBC Computers and we also have a ZX81 computer.The School also possesses a photo copier,printer,duplicating machine, projectors,TV,lighting,video and tape recorders.
The{school population}has changed tremendously during the last six years. In{1979}the number of children was about{720}but{today}there are only{310}pupils.
In Connaught School all the classes are named after Greek Cities.
